name: DefiConnect V2
public_notice: DefiConnect has migrated their token's contract address from V1 to V2. View their official announcement here.

description.en: Defi Connect aims to bring real-life and DeFi together by building applications of DeFi in payment, remittance, digital marketing, healthcare, transportation, and logistics.
